Meteor.Audio

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.Audio.AudioManager

  • public class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    AudioManager is a audio manager class.
    This class can be used to play audio files.

        Method used to add a audio clip to the hash table.

      • get

                                           boolean isKey)
        Method used to grab a audio file contained inside the hash table.
        Parameters:
        name - The name attached to the audio file.
        isKey - Weather or not the name parameter is the key generated by the AssetManager.
        Returns:
        The audio file from the hash table.
